projects.title: My world map
projects.description: This is a world map I created for myself and my Dungeons & Dragons games. It was first hand-drawn on A3 paper and then scanned and worked on in Adobe Photoshop. Every place has history and a story to tell, a lot of unique encounters and interesting things to see.

projects.title: Dragon
projects.description: An elegant beast/dragon I drew on paper. One of three prime dieties in my world which can be seen above.

projects.description: This was a random sketch I drew on a pen display.
